title: Understanding Qualitative Analysis
text: Qualitative analysis is used to identify the components of a mixture. It focuses on determining the presence or absence of certain substances.

title: Difference Between Qualitative and Quantitative Analysis
text: While qualitative analysis identifies what substances are present, quantitative analysis measures how much of each substance is present.

title: Common Techniques in Qualitative Analysis
text: Techniques such as spectroscopy, chromatography, and mass spectrometry are often used in qualitative analysis to identify unknown compounds.

title: Choosing the Right Analysis Type
text: Based on the need to identify unknown compounds in a mixture, which type of analysis should be used?
